description: Mt. Temple is the highest peak in the Lake Louise area.  The highest mountain anyone can scramble in the Canadian Rockies.Difficulty Rating:D6, Difficult to Advanced on September 12, 2009.Started at 8:45 AM. Finished at 7:00 PM.Start of Trail 1863 Meters = 6112 Feet.Mt. Temple Peak 3555 Meters = 11663 Feet.5.5 hours to reach the top/1692 Meters = 5551.18 Feet.4.6 hours to come down/Note:  One of our editors had already added Mt. Temple, which you can see here, however, this entry came with better GPS track, pictures, and, a brave soul smoking a cigar at the top (something momentous we hope as opposed to the ritual at every peak).  So we allowed this post.
title: Mt Temple
